analysis.description:
GasWar._withdraw (/unique_chucks/21/0xc9346f4a8a20bc4f5358efffb8f62de9cab930ce.sol#75-93) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- Winner.transfer(Take) (/unique_chucks/21/0xc9346f4a8a20bc4f5358efffb8f62de9cab930ce.sol#88-89)

GasWar.mul (/unique_chucks/21/0xc9346f4a8a20bc4f5358efffb8f62de9cab930ce.sol#188-191) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- a == 0
	- assert(bool)(c / a == b)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/21/0xc9346f4a8a20bc4f5358efffb8f62de9cab930ce.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.21 (/unique_chucks/21/0xc9346f4a8a20bc4f5358efffb8f62de9cab930ce.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter 'reduce_price' of GasWar._withdraw (/unique_chucks/21/0xc9346f4a8a20bc4f5358efffb8f62de9cab930ce.sol#75) is not in mixedCase
Parameter 'remove_price' of GasWar.CheckGameStart (/unique_chucks/21/0xc9346f4a8a20bc4f5358efffb8f62de9cab930ce.sol#94) is not in mixedCase
Parameter 'NS' of GasWar.SetTimes (/unique_chucks/21/0xc9346f4a8a20bc4f5358efffb8f62de9cab930ce.sol#162) is not in mixedCase
Parameter 'NE' of GasWar.SetTimes (/unique_chucks/21/0xc9346f4a8a20bc4f5358efffb8f62de9cab930ce.sol#162-163) is not in mixedCase
